original_text: Solomon took a census of all the foreigners residing in Israel, after the census his father David had taken; and they were found to be 153,600.
korean_text: 전에 솔로몬의 아버지 다윗이 이스라엘 땅에 사는 이방 사람들을 조사하였더니 이제 솔로몬이 다시 조사하매 모두 십오만 삼천 육백 명이라

sentences.original_text: of all the foreigners residing in Israel
after the census his father David had taken
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 다윗이 실시한 인구 조사 이후에

sentences.original_text: and they were found to be 153,600
